description: Apply CMYK adjustments to specific color ranges.
name: selectivecolor

options.description:
Select color correction method.

Available values are:

‘absolute’

Specified adjustments are applied "as-is" (added/subtracted to original pixel component value).

‘relative’

Specified adjustments are relative to the original component value.

Default is absolute.
options.name: correction_method

options.description: Adjustments for red pixels (pixels where the red component is the maximum)
options.name: reds

options.description: Adjustments for yellow pixels (pixels where the blue component is the minimum)
options.name: yellows

options.description: Adjustments for green pixels (pixels where the green component is the maximum)
options.name: greens

options.description: Adjustments for cyan pixels (pixels where the red component is the minimum)
options.name: cyans

options.description: Adjustments for blue pixels (pixels where the blue component is the maximum)
options.name: blues

options.description: Adjustments for magenta pixels (pixels where the green component is the minimum)
options.name: magentas

options.description: Adjustments for white pixels (pixels where all components are greater than 128)
options.name: whites

options.description: Adjustments for all pixels except pure black and pure white
options.name: neutrals

options.description: Adjustments for black pixels (pixels where all components are lesser than 128)
options.name: blacks

options.description: Specify a Photoshop selective color file (.asv) to import the settings from.
options.name: psfile
